"Richard Hildreth," American National Biography, Supplement 2, pp. 258-260. He is best known for writing his six-volume History of the United States of America, 1849-1853.Hughes, Lynn Gordon. "Richard Hildreth," Dictionary of Unitarian and Universalist Biography; retrieved 2012-11-8. ==Selected works== In an overview of writings by and about Hildreth, OCLC/WorldCat lists roughly 270 works in 870+ publications in 11 languages and 12,800+ library holdings.
